castle.comment: Story for Ariving at the castle safely
castle.text:
You arrive at the castle and you are the only one there for the challenge. You are immediately pointed as the king.
You become known as lol The Great and died many years later.

Start.text:
You have been invited to a challenge the winner will become king of the kingdom 
lol as you are walking on a path to the castle it splits into two. Which way do you go?
A. Go left 
B. Go Right

left.comment: Story For going left at the crossroads
left.text:
You went left and see a house what do you do? 
A. Go in
 B. continue on your way

right.comment: Story for going right at the crossroads
right.text:
You are walking when the path disappears and a cliff is in front of you. What do you do?
A. Jump off 
 B. Go Back

house.text:
You went into the house and see nothing of interest. 
(You should probably leave before the owners come back)
A. Leave
